references.paper_title: Medical image segmentation review: The success of u-net
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of medical image segmentation, highlighting the success of U-net and its variants.

references.paper_title: U-net: Convolutional networks for biomedical image segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduces the U-Net architecture, a seminal work in medical image segmentation that forms the basis of many subsequent modifications and improvements.

references.paper_title: An image is worth 16x16 words: Transformers for image recognition at scale
references.reason: This paper introduces the Vision Transformer (ViT), which significantly impacted computer vision by demonstrating the effectiveness of transformers for image classification and segmentation.

references.paper_title: Mamba: Linear-time sequence modeling with selective state spaces
references.reason: This paper introduces the Mamba model, which improves the efficiency of sequence modeling and addresses the computational demands of transformers in long-range dependency learning.
This paper introduces xLSTM, which enhances the capabilities of traditional LSTMs and provides a competitive edge in sequence modeling, especially relevant for U-net modifications.
